participant_1.background:
I like to spend time practicing my archery and cloud watching on weekends.
I'm a mystery movie fan and a baker.
I and my mom like to listen to the Beatles together.
he worked hard.
I like to wear comfortable clothes to work.

participant_2.background:
My drum set is my most valued material possession because it is a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there.
I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am.
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
I remember summers spent playing in the creek with my friends.

content.text: Doing great! What are your interests?
I'm a mystery movie fan and I'm a baker. I like to spend time practicing my archery and cloud watching on weekends.
That's great! I wish I could bake. I'm more into playing drums and collecting comic books. I also love summers spent playing in the creek with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! Where do you like to go archery and cloud watching?
Usually I go to the park near my house. It has a lot of open space and it's a great place to relax and enjoy the outdoors.
That sounds like a great place to go! I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's really nice. What's your favorite mystery movie?
I'm not sure I have a favorite, but I really like the ones by Agatha Christie.
I love Agatha Christie! I think she's the best mystery writer of all time.
I agree! Her books are so well-written and they always keep me guessing.
Me too! I've read so many of her books and I've never been disappointed.
Same here! I'm glad to meet someone who likes mysteries as much as I do.
